LanguageData.RimFridge_1_1_0_5.content: Building RimFridge buttons in the Temperature menu have been reduced to two buttons - Floor Based Fridges & Wall Based Fridges. Selecting either will give options to build single, dual, and quad fridges. | img:https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/789759428641511940/97628F424938E238C4132C6914BF87B8D38F84C8/
